name: The Cleric of Clanggedin (Cleric 32 / Fighter 6 / Rogue 2)
author: Orion

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
The Cleric of Clanggedin


Clerics get huge AB boosts.

Here I attempt to make use of this flexibility by incorporating:
- Epic Damage Reduction III
- Auto-Silent III
- Combat prowess (WF/EWF/EP, Blind Fight, Knockdown/Improved Knockdown, near max discipline, Armor Skin)

It was originally designed as a healer tank however due to Deity restrictions the Healing domain options were not great. Clanggedin fit the cleric design better as a result.

@Aquarius 233 and I had a discussion already and one idea was to skip the Con requirements of EDR III would be to take a Cleric 28/F2/DD10 or Cleric 26/DD14 split, it does mean Dex will have to be 13+

Anyway here it is

Buffed AB -> base AB 34 +5 (GMW) +2 (bless/aid) +5 (divine power) +5 (divine favor) = 50 Can add empowered bulls for +2-3 so AB 52-53
Can add aura of vitality, prayer, battletide but one will not always have them active

Multi class penalty from level 22 onward can be a pain tho. Also, why silent spell on cleric?

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
fallander69 wrote:
Mar 30, 2020
Pretty great battle cleric and it is a dwarf, yup! 
Multi class penalty from level 22 onward can be a pain tho. Also, why silent spell on cleric? 
This is one of Grizzled_Dwarflord's ideas, the self-silent aura killer cleric.
He has written about it in Vicar of the Void which is a implosion killer cleric with self-silence auras.
Here I take Auto-Silent III, you can cast extended silence on yourself for up to 60+ rounds, then go invisible/haste, stand next to mages, cast divine favor/divine power/word of faith (to blind them) etc etc, use harm, they will hate you and they can't cast against you without auto-silent themselves, hopefully you can make them blind and then they wont be able to target you either
I haven't got a good screenshot to demonstrate it, but this is the best I have, using UMD + Self silence targeted scroll

posts.author: fallander69

posts.author: webshaman1
posts.content:
Yes, it would be possible to have SD instead of Rogue.

You'll have to take the pre-reqs (dodge, mobility, hide 10 ranks, move silently 8 ranks, tumble 5 ranks), however.  And you would be sacrificing UMD.

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
fallander69 wrote:
Mar 30, 2020
This is brilliant! Thx for this tip with silent casting.
One thing, is it possible to have SD insted rouge levels?
You'll need to increase dex to 13
Take Dodge and Mobility as feats
The build as it stands may struggle with skill points so you may want to drop EDR III too
I wouldn't recommend using SD in this build. 
No point having 500-700+HP EDR III, Full plate/Tower and HiPS there isn't a lot of synergy

There are dex cleric builds designed with SD

Some that may be of interest include: 
'The Shadow Priest' by Maximillan Kane
'The Rogue Immaculate' by Grizzled_Dwarflord

These look like the best SD Dex Cleric builds I can find

posts.author: fallander69
posts.content: Another option to avoid XP penalty is to make the guy NE, taking Assassin instead. Obtaining 8 ranks in hide and move silently shouldn't be a problem, but if we talking WoG then it would be loosing Strength domain and picking up trickery and war Erythnul follower, which changes then concept slightly. Then i would dump Discipline entirely, use some Knockdown immunity gear and trade KD/ IKD for Expertise/ IE. Not saying it is better, just as an option :)

posts.author: Orion
posts.content:
Thanks fallander69, its certainly a good option to avoid 20% XP penalties to go Assassin
It would grant Tumble 40, UMD and uncanny dodge which is fabulous and the purpose of those classes.
Downside is losing evasion, less skill points (8) and spending 16 crossclassed skill points (32 skill points). 
With 184 skill points in the build, the 40 skill points can make a difference.

XP penalties are a problem for some environments, especially single player modules where experience and gold are finite.
I always like to get the most value from my exp-gains when I play characters!
